General.Name: Xinjiang East Universe Group Gas Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang East Universe Gas Co.Ltd. engages in the natural gas sales, natural gas facility equipment installation, and natural gas heating businesses. It also provides refrigeration and air conditioning services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Changji, the People's Republic of China
General.Address: No. 198, Yan'an North Road, Changji, China, 831100
